Text: does anyone know when season 2 is coming? has it been aired yet?

@sunshinestate:
Hi there, thanks for the interest in commenting. But, I went back, pulled up the disk, and it actually has stellar audio and video quality. You're probably not using VLC player, or you most likely have some bad codecs installed, because the files are perfect.
